data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="EmailTemplateNode" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="org/forgerock/openam/auth/nodes/EmailTemplateNode"  i18nKey="nodeDescription"  resourceName="EmailTemplateNode"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/EmailTemplateNode" ><Organization><SubSchema i18nKey="nodeDescription"  inheritance="multiple"  name="instance"  resourceName="USE-PARENT"  validate="yes" ><AttributeSchema i18nKey="emailTemplateName"  name="emailTemplateName"  order="100"  resourceName="emailTemplateName"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>welcome</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="emailAttribute"  name="emailAttribute"  order="200"  resourceName="emailAttribute"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>mail</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="identityAttribute"  name="identityAttribute"  order="400"  resourceName="identityAttribute"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>userName</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="objectType"  name="objectType"  order="300"  resourceName="objectType"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>user</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema name="RequiredValueValidator0"  syntax="string"  type="validator" ><DefaultValues><Value>com.sun.identity.sm.RequiredValueValidator</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema></SubSchema></Organization></Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
